item.title: Review: Forecasting Competition
Project 3: Seeing into the Future
item.description: Hi! It’s my birthday today. Thank you for passing by! Without further ado, let’s start seeing my future! Nah! Iâ€™m just fooling around. Now, let us become serious, here is an approach to a financial time series data. What to expect in project? In this project, I’ll try to analyze the effect of events when in a weekly transaction dataset. Expect visualizations that involves: 1. Autocorrelations and PACF 2. Transformations (Log and Standard) 3.
